scripts.deploy:bicep: az stack group create --name ne-bicep-assets-ds -g ne-bicep-assets-rg -f ./main.bicep --dm none --aou deleteAll --yes
scripts.deploy:bicep-test: yarn bicep-assets deploy && az stack group create --name ne-bicep-assets-test-ds -g ne-bicep-assets-rg -f ./main-test.bicep --dm none --aou deleteAll --yes
scripts.deploy:bicep-test2: yarn bicep-assets deploy && az deployment group create -g ne-bicep-assets-rg -f ./main-test.bicep
scripts.deploy:zip-bicep: az stack group create --name ne-bicep-assets-zipdeploy-ds -g ne-bicep-assets-rg -f ./assets-sa-code.bicep --dm none --aou deleteAll --yes --parameters storageAccountName=bicepassetssdnwausk76ooe
scripts.deploy:zip-asset: yarn bicep-assets upload -s bicepassetssdnwausk76ooe -a bicep-assets-crp -c zipdeploy -b bicep-assets-crp.zip
scripts.deploy:zip: yarn build && yarn deploy:zip-asset && yarn deploy:zip-bicep
